sources.title: The Stolen Jools
sources.description: Title: The Stolen Jools Summary: Star-packed promotional short subject intended to raise funds for the National Variety Artists tuberculosis sanatorium, produced in association with a cigarette company! Plot involves the ... Directed by: William C. McGann, John G. Adolfi, Thomas Atkins Actors: Production Company: Masquers Club of Hollywood Release Date: 4 April 1931 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Star-packed promotional short subject intended to raise funds for the National Variety Artists tuberculosis sanatorium, produced in association with a cigarette company! Plot involves the investigation of the reported theft of Norma Shearer's jewelry.

metadata.Plot: Star-packed promotional short subject intended to raise funds for the National Variety Artists tuberculosis sanatorium, produced in association with a cigarette company! Plot involves the investigation of the reported theft of Norma Shearer's jewelry.
